backend/main.mo: Motoko backend providing user profile management with authorization, contact form submission storage, admin-only retrieval, and a public location query.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a hero overlay opacity update to the specific frontend file and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries detailing the purpose of each frontend file in the marketing site.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH theme variables, light/dark modes, and global component styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file with SEO metadata and Google Fonts preconnect for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component composing all marketing sections with header and footer.
frontend/src/features/contact/hooks/useS: Empty placeholder file for a contact form submission hook.
frontend/src/features/marketing/componen: Renders the Farm 2 Kitchen logo with configurable sizing.
Footer showing copyright, attribution, and a caffeine.ai referral link.
Sticky responsive header with logo, navigation links, and mobile menu behavior.
frontend/src/features/marketing/config/w: Exports WhatsApp config containing the numeric chat destination.
frontend/src/features/marketing/sections: About section describing sourcing, processing, and delivery with three feature cards.
Contact section displaying location, phone number, and a WhatsApp chat button without form submission.
Landing hero with background image, tagline, and buttons that scroll to About or Contact sections.
Shows an image and a four-step quality process with icons describing cleaning, drying, grinding, and packing.
Displays three customer testimonials with quotes, names, and locations.
Lists four common uses of the turmeric product with icons and descriptions, alongside a decorative background image.
Highlights five selling points of the product using icons and brief benefit descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching contact submissions and location info from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom color palette themed around turmeric with light/dark modes and utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with ReactDOM, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash-based routes), storing them in sessionStorage, retrieving them, and clearing stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining color tokens, typography, animations, container settings, and custom plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the Farm 2 Kitchen website state, design goals, contact/hero requirements, known issues, and implemented feature records.
